description.raw:
We use the brew formula to resolve dependencies in our CI, but sometimes there are different dependencies for different major versions of a package. For example, gazebo, sdformat, and ign-transport have scripts in release-tools that detect this manually, though most of the ignition packages don't have custom scripts; they just use the generic `project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash` script.

As we are planning to add dependencies on `ign-cmake` to the ignition packages now, I'm adding some major version detection for packages that use `ign-cmake` to the generic script so we don't need to make a bunch more CI scripts for each ignition package. Also, I delete the custom ign-math script since it's not needed anymore.

Tested with ign-math:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/192/
